member.name: T:API.API.DataUnitType
member.summary: Defines the unit Type that the Station Data Value is Stored in. eg the "UnitType"
member.remarks: This creates a standard to make it easier for other Plugin Creators.

member.name: P:API.API.StationData.LastUpdated
member.summary: Declares the last time the Station Data was Updated
member.remarks: Update this whenever data is Sucessfully retrived from the Station. This is also used to tell if the Plugin has stopped working, if its caught in a loop etc.

member.name: M:API.API.IWXStation.ApplySettings(System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection{API.API.Config})
member.summary: Apply New Settings to the Station

member.name: M:API.API.IWXStation.Disconnect
member.summary: This is called on program shutdown.
member.remarks: Use this to close TCP/IP, Serial Ports etc.

member.name: M:API.API.MiscFunctions.GetSerialNames
member.summary: Gets a List of all the Serial Ports on the PC, Including Virtual Ports
member.returns: A List of all the Serial Ports on the PC, Including Virtual Ports

member.name: T:My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
